title: Josephus and the Emperor
description: The Josephus Trilogy--about Flavius Josephus beginning in the year 60 in Rome Der jüdische Krieg (Josephus), 1932 Die Söhne (The Jews of Rome), 1935 Der Tag wird kommen (Das gelobte Land, The day will come, Josephus & the Emperor), 1942
author: Lion Feuchtwanger
